nodes.text: A sun was located in the Dassal system of the Unknown Regions. During the Cold War, the star was drained away by the First Order's superweapon, Starkiller Base, and its planets were cored out. Poe Dameron and Kazuda Xiono investigated First Order activity in the system, discovering the sun's disappearance. Xiono correctly speculated that the disappearance of the star and the devastation of the planets had been caused by the First Order.
